attributes.action: Make Sweet Caroline the English National Anthem
attributes.additional_details: Give the people what they want. It will be so good, so good, so good.
attributes.background: Change the English National Anthem to Sweet Caroline as it's an absolute banger and loved by all.

rejection.details:
This isn’t something that the UK Government or Parliament would be able to do. The use of the present National Anthem is a matter of tradition rather than having any legal or constitutional status.

You can find more information about the history and status of the national anthem here: https://www.royal.uk/national-anthem
